#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
     int cases;
     scanf("%d",&cases);   
     int num, numb;
     while(cases--)
     {
        scanf("%d",&num);
        numb=num^(num>>16);
        numb^=(numb>>8);
        numb^=(numb>>4);
        numb^=(numb>>2);
        numb^=(numb>>1);
        printf("%d\n",numb);
  }
  return 0;
}
